name: e-services
description: Backend microservices monorepo - Auth, Category, Coupon, GraphQL Gateway, Order, Product, Ticket services

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn dev:auth" "yarn dev:category" "yarn dev:coupon" "yarn dev:gateway" "yarn dev:order" "yarn dev:product" "yarn dev:ticket" --names "auth,category,coupon,gateway,order,product,ticket" --prefix-colors "magenta,green,yellow,cyan,blue,white,red"
scripts.build: yarn build:auth && yarn build:category && yarn build:coupon && yarn build:gateway && yarn build:order && yarn build:product && yarn build:ticket
scripts.test: yarn test:auth && yarn test:category && yarn test:coupon && yarn test:gateway && yarn test:order && yarn test:product && yarn test:ticket
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspace @3asoftwares/auth-service run test -- --coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/category-service run test -- --coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/coupon-service run test -- --coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/graphql-gateway run test -- --coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/order-service run test -- --coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/product-service run test -- --coverage && yarn workspace @3asoftwares/ticket-service run test -- --coverage
